ModMetaData.name: RimForge - Only Power Poles
ModMetaData.author: Epicguru (James B)
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the Power Poles from RimForge, and nothing else. Power poles are a way to avoid running cables everywhere, and instead have a more aesthetic power grid.
The poles are part of a larger mod, RimForge. RimForge already includes the poles, so this mod is incompatible with the main RimForge mod.
